programme.desc: Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so journeys into the couch to find it in 'Lost in Couch', then in 'Pat-a-thon', Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Barking Up the Wrong Tree: Sonic is shocked that the Boscage Maze "Monster" is Amy AKA Thorn Rose. Wielding a Paradox Prism shard, Thorn wages war on the tree-dwelling Scavengers. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Looperheroes: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Man-kini: When a new internet celebrity is causing havoc in Swellview, Captain Man has to body swap with Frankini to infiltrate his secret lair. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Painter finds a new subject to paint in 'Mommy's Masterpiece', then in 'A Thief Among Us!', the Smurfs' favourite things start disappearing all over the village. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Ogre Love: Big Mouth falls in love with Smurfette after she pulls a splinter from his thumb. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob hides the secret formula at home, Gary must protect it from Plankton in 'Pineapple Invasion', then in 'Salsa Imbecilicus', an accident causes everyone in town to become like Patrick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, so Squidward offers to help find him a new home in 'Unreal Estate', then in 'Code Yellow', Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tripped!: Everyone in the family has been working hard to save up for a family vacation. But while road tripping to their destination, everything that can go for the family wrong does. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has a plan for introducing himself to a new girl in 'White Hare', then in 'Insta-Gran', Pop Pop introduces his new girlfriend to the family. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hosts an award ceremony in 'The Starry Awards', and then in 'Blorpsgiving', Captain Doug Quasar meets Pat-Tron's robot family. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob volunteers to babysit 'Sandy's Nutty Nieces', then in 'Insecurity Guards', SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Parks & T-Rex: Preoccupied with Z-Force training, Phoebe & Max learn that they've forgotten special family events. Wanting to make it up, Phoebe plans a family fun day. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 2: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Rowena casts a spell on Voltaire in 'Dragon Pet', then in 'Ultimate Prank', the Smurfs are fed up with Jokey's pranks and decide to play him at his own game. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help cure 'Rowena's Plant', then in 'What a Doll', Rowena decides to turn Vanity and Storm into dolls to play with. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In an episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive in 'Driven to Drive', then in 'A Patty in Time', Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krab's newest menu item. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds gather ingredients for an italian chef in 'Nonna Your Business', and the road trip continues in 'Alpining Away', when Lynn crushes on a boy. (S8, ep 6)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Situation - Grim: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs resorts to desperate measures after Plankton drives away his customers in 'Free Samples', and then in 'Home Sweet Rubble', SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and needs re-modelling.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: All About Steve: Billy hopes that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Lucky Charm: When Lila buys Nori a lucky charm bracelet at the Rock Island Flea Market, they soon realise that the bracelet is not what it seems. Meesha and Lila must figure out the secret. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Thumb Buddies: Captain Man and Kid Danger get jealous when a new crime-fighting team emerges in Swellview. Guest starring Jerry Trainor. (S4, ep 13)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Saturday Night Lies: When Ray runs into an ex-girlfriend, he tries to impress her by pretending that Henry, Charlotte, and Jasper are his children. (S4, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Are You Afraid of the Park?: Max and Phoebe start a fight between Billy and Nora so they can avoid riding a roller coaster, but it all backfires when things get out of control. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Evil Never Sleeps: Phoebe's allegiance is torn when she learns her boyfriend's father might be plotting a return to evil, and she must decide whether to take him down. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Wedding of the Trentury: Captain Man & Danger Force offer to host the wedding of the century for Swellview's beloved newscaster Trent Overunder and his internet girlfriend Tracy426. (S2, ep 24)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Tori Tortures Teacher: The kids take Sikowitz to see a play to celebrate his 10-year teaching anniversary, but the subject sends him into a funk. It's up to Tori to cheer him up. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Prides-Maids: When Julie invites her dad, James (aka Mapleview's favourite drag queen, Aurora Borealis) to perform at Pride week, the girls think they have popularity in the bag. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Licence to Fly: Ray agrees to let Henry fly his helicopter, but it's too much for Ray when he starts to act like a nervous parent. Charlotte, Jasper, and Piper find a cotton candy machine. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Swellview's Got Talent: After discovering contestants on Swellview's Got Talent are losing consciousness, Captain Man and Kid Danger find out what is causing the mischief. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thundreth: Nearing their 100th save, Phoebe & Max are determined to make it their best one yet. But they overlook a super villain plotting revenge on his old rivals - Hank and Barb. (S4, ep 29)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Looperheroes: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Something in the Water: The gang encounters an old friend of Uncle Charlie's whose been keeping himself young by drinking from a fountain of youth! Meesha accidentally becomes a baby, (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Who's That Girl?: The gang comes across a glamorous girl with a vintage spy camera and no memory. Is she a spy? With Raquel sniffing around, the team tries to help the mysterious girl. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: There's no ARRGH in "Team": Sonic and the crew of the Angel's Voyage aren't the only ones after the No Place Shard. The Chaos Council co-opted Nine's Shatterdrive tech and want it back too! (S1, ep 8)

programme.desc: Entrenched: To get information on Pearl Girl, Astra strikes a risky deal with a powerful fish, but the outcome is more than she bargained for. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Case of the Moon-Days: In order to evade Monster Hunters, Clawdeen must accept who she is to save herself and Cleo. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Portrait of a Monster: Frankie's identity crisis during picture days causes her to ZAP a camera into a live, soul-sucking menace. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Witch Hitch: Toralei and Lagoona threaten to expose Draculaura as a witch, compromising her spot as Head Fearleader. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Part of the Pack: Clawdeen's friendship with Frankie and Draculaura is tested when she's invited to join Monster High's werewolf pack. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Thirst Quencher: It's another heatwave and even the riverbed has dried up. A very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the lemmings have used the last of the water to fill their inflatable pool. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Spider Lemmings: The lemmings have caught a spider and her sticky, elastic threads are perfect for bungee jumping, but Grizzy discovers that he has arachnophobia. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Random Bear: Grizzy and the lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Interference: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner, but his meal is interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy finds that the true 'interference' is down to the lemmings. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Luck: After making a fool of himself in front of she-bear, Grizzy finds a four-leaf clover which seems to bring him good luck. Could his chance be changing? (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Charm: Grizzy believes that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. He looks through the ranger's book of fairytales, searching for a way to turn her back. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear's Best Friend: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon near the log cabin. When the lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Treasure Bear: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Lemmings!: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Flower Power: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzy's adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Countdown: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Airlines: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his snack by a strange flow of objects that have been transformed into hot air balloons. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Gliding: The Lemmings kite surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite to win she-bear's affection. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Sound of a Lemming: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear in the Wind: The Lemmings play a new game but interrupt Grizzy watching his favourite TV show. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Construction Bear: Grizzy decides to build a building to impress she-bear. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Kung Fu Lemmings: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Midsummer Bear's Dream: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight but is woken up by the Lemmings blasting music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Païpaï Race: The Tikis face the Cold Kings in the Marshes, a place crawling with Lion Lilies. Seeking for a solution, Enki ventures alone into the jungle. Corto then rushes to his rescue. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Welcome to Paroa: Corto has wrecked Maroro! To find a crucial part, the Tikis go to the Shore Scrubber's market, in Paroa. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Mess: Bad luck! L.J. breaks a Shard-embedded mirror so Jade becomes a trouble magnet while tracking the Shard. Worse, the evil Crimson Lord is back in town. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Lies: A friend of Adrien's gets akumatized into Lies. Able to make liars disappear, she is determined to rid the world of lies and those who tell them... even superheroes! (S4 Ep2)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: The Future King of Duels: Luke challenges Yuga to a Rush Duel to prove that he's the future King of Duels! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Horoscare: Conflicting horoscares/horoscopes predict a visit with Cleo's favorite influencer could go well or terribly wrong. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Flaunt Your Skeleton: Ghoulia's dream and nightmare is about to come true when she is set to perform with superstar alum, Debbie Scary. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Creepover Party: Draculaura, Clawdeen and Frankie meet Twyla, a boogey monster, while spending a night in the library. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Monster High

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Glaciator: Ladybug faces Andrè the ice-cream maker, now Glaciator. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Cleaning Time!: Grimes is back! Will he put Luke through the wringer, or can Luke clean up this cheater's act? (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: To the Promised Vacation! Vegeta Goes on a Family Trip?!: While Goku gets to spend his time training on King Kai's planet, Vegeta is on a family vacation! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Explosion Berries: Lost and alone on the surface of a world she's never before seen, Kipo must find her way back to her burrow with the help of a hardened surface survivor named Wolf. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: The Sword Part 2: When Catra, Adora's best friend in the Fright Zone, leads an attack on Thaymor, our three heroes must work together to save the unarmed village. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: The Evillustrator: Ladybug must stop the Evillustrator, an akumatized boy who wants to take revenge on Chloe. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Simon Says: Humiliated in a TV talent contest where he performed a hypnotist act, Simon is akumatized and turned into Simon Says. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Rogercop: Chloe accuses Marinette of stealing her new bracelet, starting a series of events that allows Hawk Moth to akumatize Sabrina's policeman father. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Monster High

programme.desc: Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n mynd i'r ffair, ond mae 'na broblem fawr yn codi pan gaiff y crebachwr ei ddefnyddio. Blero goes to the funfair but the shrinkasizer creates a huge mess!

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni

programme.title: Sigldigwt

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd

programme.title: The Larkins

programme.title: Bush Pilot

programme.title: Third Alibi

programme.title: The 20 Questions Murder Mystery

programme.title: Highway to Battle

programme.title: Cover Girl Killer

programme.title: The Court Martial of Major Keller

programme.title: Sitting Bull

programme.title: Scotland Yard

programme.title: Bonanza

programme.title: Out of Town

programme.title: The Footage Detectives

programme.title: Strip Tease Murder

programme.title: Mademoiselle

programme.title: Time Of His Life
programme.desc: 1955. Comedy. A released prisoner (Richard Hearne) goes home to embarrass his social climbing daughter. Starring Richard Wattis. [S]

programme.title: Three Steps to the Gallows

programme.title: The Monkey's Paw
programme.desc: 1948. Horror. A curio dealer sells a monkey's paw that can grant the possessor three wishes but warns that disaster will follow. Starring Michael Martin-Harvey, Sydney Tafler & Alfie Bass. [S]

programme.title: Sunny Sunday by the Sea 1951
programme.desc: 1951. A fabulous trip to Southend to spend a sunny Sunday by the sea.

programme.title: Radio Cab Murder
programme.desc: 1954. Crime drama directed by Vernon Sewell and filmed at Nettelfold. An ex-convict taxi driver poses as a crook to catch a bank robber. Starring Jimmy Hanley and Sam Kydd. [S]

programme.title: The Hi-jackers
programme.desc: 1963. Drama. Director: Jim O'Connolly. Stars Anthony Booth & Jacqueline Ellis. A lorry driver meets Shirley at a cafe and offers her a lift. His truck carrying valuable whiskey is later hijacked. [S]

programme.title: White Corridors

programme.title: Night Call with the Brighton Police

programme.title: The Dark Man

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre

programme.title: Star Performance: Marked Down
programme.desc: 1952. Director: William A. Seiter. Stars: Ida Lupino, Sarah Selby & Lyn Guild. A woman who works at a fancy dress shop is determined to meet and marry the millionaire whose office is next door. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Devil's Fingers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Marilyn Hanold. Batman and Robin must stop a nefarious concert pianist who's plotting to kill Bruce and marry Aunt Harriet. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Heads or Tails. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Richard Bebb & Raf De La Torre. Released from prison after serving eight years, Bill Weldon sets out to kill the three men who testified against him. [S]

programme.title: Pickup Alley

programme.title: Dr. Phibes Rises Again

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
